message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll find it's worth every penny. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.
Alice,  $12,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product but I can only go up to $9,000 at this time.  Let's see if we can find some common ground.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11,000.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $11,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,500.  This is my final offer.

Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go as high as $10,500. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $11,200. This is my final offer.
